title: Mashandiro Ayo - Orbital Tembere
heading: Mashandiro Arinoita
intro: Chirongwa cheOrbital Temple chine zvinhu zvitatu zvakabatana zvinoshanda pamwechete kutumira mazita kutemberi muchadenga.
paragraph1: Iyo satellite inotenderera Pasi pakakwirira inosvika 525 km, ichichengeta mazita mundangariro dzayo. Zviteshi zvepasi zvinotaurirana nesatellite panguva yekupfuura kwayo, ichitumira mazita akatumirwa nevanhu kuburikidza newebhusaiti.
paragraph2: Paunotumira zita, rinobatana nemutsara uye rinotumirwa kune satellite panguva inotevera inowanikwa. Uchagashira email simbiso kana zita rako raiswa zvinobudirira kuOrbital Temple.
